name: Banana Ahead
description:
Banana Ahead is a two-player cooperative puzzle game. Player 1 is a headless body who can move and toss its head. Player 2 is a body-less head who can see and communicate with the bod. Players must work together to navigate treacherous levels.

The most hardcore gamers won't talk at all while playing.

Designed with PS4 controllers. All controls should be evident but here they are in case they're not.

P1:

Move - Left analogue stick

Look up/down; rotate - Right analogue stick

Toss the head - R1

Reel the head in - L1

P2:

Hold R2 for command list to see what you can send to P1.

  • Programming - Scott Tongue
  • Art - Ryan Cantar
  • Sound, Programming - Eric Guadara
